name: Balloon Fight: Bursting!
description:
This game was developed with no commercial intends. By any means do NOT buy or sell this game. BALLOON FIGHT RENEWED AS A 4 PLAYER VERSUS GAME!

BURST AS MANY BUBBLES, BALLONS & ENEMIES AS YOU CAN BEFORE THE TIME RUNS OUT. BE CAREFUL TO NOT GET HIT BY THE SPARKS COMING OUT FROM THE CLOUDS! ALSO, STAY OUT OF THE WATER IF YOU DON'T WANT TO DROWN OR BE EATEN BY A MONSTRUOUS BIG FISH!

JOIN THE PARTY AND PREPARE FOR THE BATTLE!

- 2-4 PLAYERS -
- PLAY IN THE 12 ORIGINAL STAGES FROM BALLOON FIGHT! -
- CLOUDS, SPARKS, BUBBLES, PROPELLERS AND A BIG FISH JUST AS IN THE ORIGINAL GAME! -
- NEW AIR TANK MECHANIC TO PREVENT JUMP SPAMMING -
- FULL GAMEPAD SUPPORT! -

KEYBOARD (KEYBOARD LAYOUTS ARE NOT LIMITED TO ANY PLAYER) LAYOUT 1ACTIONLAYOUT 2QJOIN/STARTGAMOVE LEFTBDMOVE RIGHT
MCAUTO JUMP (HOLDABLE)KVSINGLE JUMPL GAMEPAD XBOX CONTROLLERACTION PS CONTROLLER MENUJOIN/START OPTIONSDPAD/LEFT STICKMOVE LEFT/RIGHT DPAD/LEFT STICKA AUTO JUMP (HOLDABLE) CROSSBSINGLE JUMP CIRCLE Balloon Fight was originally developed by Nintendo in 1984. All rights reserved to it's corresponding owners.
In honor and memory of Satoru Iwata. This fan game was developed with much love and respect by Enio Lotero. 

HAVE FUN WITH YOUR FRIENDS! :)
